page.title: 17Superstitions
page.content: It is a{superstition}that you should never walk under a ladder for fear of bad luck.You should say{"white {rabbits"}at the beginning of each month.If you cross two fingers it is meant to bring you bad luck.If you{ {cross}one finger it brings you good luck.If you break a mirror it brings you bad luck for seven years.If you carry a rabbit's foot or skull it is supposed to bring you good luck.The bride and bridegroom must never see each other on the morning of the wedding.If you throw salt over your shoulder it brings you good luck.There is a rhyme about a pin:find a pin and pick it up and all day long you'll have good luck.Find a pin let it lie you'll need a pin before you die.
